name: Detective Holiday in the New Years Nightmare
name_original: Detective Holiday in the New Years Nightmare
description:
Controls

A/D or arrow keys to move

E to interact with suspects

Mouse left click for buttons

An end of year celebration is abruptly ended when the body of a party-goer is discovered. Seven party-goers are left, each of them a suspect. With nothing but the testimonies of each suspect, Detective Holiday must deduce who among them is a killer. Find out when the murder weapon was taken, when the victim was killed, and solve the case!

Each play-through of Detective Holiday sees the titular detective solving a new and exciting randomly generated murder!

Made in 5 days for Weekly Game Jam - Week 181. The theme was New Years Countdown.

created with https://jacksontheel.itch.io/

Thank you Liz for the original Detective Holiday Soundtrack, and Sam for the title screen and mansion background art!
